home.title: Zejun's
home.intro: Hi! I am Zejun Zhou, a second year master student currently pursuing a Master of Science degree in Computer Science and Data Science at Brown University. Outside work, I like to swim and play badminton. I am also a lover of hiking. Reach me out if you want to hang out together!
home.whatIDoSub: A snapshot of the domains and problems I've worked on.
home.letsConnectSub: Looking for a collaborator, or just want to chat about tech, hiking trails, or a badminton match? Drop me a line!

highlight.cloudDesc: Built scalable pipelines on AWS processing 300K+ documents across 100 accounts using ECS, S3, and DynamoDB.
highlight.devopsDesc: Developed GPU health checks on Kubernetes clusters, reducing allocation failures by 30% with custom monitoring plugins.
highlight.fullstackDesc: Created research tools with React + Flask + Cassandra, published at AAAI Symposium Series 2024.
highlight.dataDesc: Built semantic search engines with vector embeddings, MapReduce pipelines, and RAG-based retrieval systems.
